Class CliElement

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.graphics.simple.CliElement
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class CliElement extends Object implements ICliRenderable
Represents a generic cli graphic element.

    • setCell

      public void setCell(int x, int y, CliTextElement textElement)
      Sets a single cell of the object's representation to the specified element.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the cell to change.
      y - y coordinate of the cell to change.
      textElement - element to set at the specified coordinates.

    • getCell

      public CliTextElement getCell(int x, int y)
      Get a single element at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the chosen cell.
      y - y coordinate of the chosen cell.
      Returns:
      the element at the specified coordinates.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns:
